description: Killarney Lake is a little undeveloped section of Mount Work Park. There is a short trail that circumnavigates the lake and also connects to trails in the mountain bike area of the Park. Best access is from the trail head on Meadowbrook Road. The park is surrounded by private property, obey all signs.
directions: From Victoria follow the Pat Bay Highway and take the West Saanich Road exit. From West Saanich Road turn left on Prospect Lake Road, then right on Meadowbrook Road. There is side road off of Meadowbrook Road named Wildview where parking is tolerated on one side. Any parking past Wildview is prohibited and subject to towing.
title: Killarney Lake
